20101207154559.500|20101207154600.750|CCO|>> Reporter: INCLUDING YOUTUBE 
20101207154600.750|20101207154602.000|CCO|VIDEOS LIKE THESE.
20101207154602.000|20101207154604.000|CCO|>> IT WAS THE HOT AND THE 
20101207154604.000|20101207154606.000|CCO|COLDNESS.
20101207154606.000|20101207154608.000|CCO|AND IT WAS SITTING HERE.
20101207154608.000|20101207154610.000|CCO|AND EXPLODED INTO PIECES.
20101207154610.000|20101207154612.000|CCO|>> Reporter: NOW, "CONSUMER 
20101207154612.000|20101207154614.000|CCO|REPORTS" SAYS GLASS BAKEWARE CAN

20101207154643.429|20101207154644.857|CCO|BAKEWARE, THE OLD TYPE OF GLASS,
